channel.title: Need everyones opinion! - pleas read & post
channel.description:
First of all before I talk about what I want to say is that I posted this here for my new site skin that I am making & only reason is because I want to know all the FAQ's about a moparscape server development team interest. I haven't finished the site in my sig in case someone wants to ask a question about that either. Anyways:
I am asking everyone in the mopar community about what pages do you think development teams feature. For a hint on what I am saying, what pages do you think should also be added to the site? Such as pages referring to our team members, about us, our products, job offers, our games - beside those what other pages should we add?
Thanks for your opinion by the way - I really need this opinion so much... also here is a sneak peak of my site in development: [IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii3/Ixl_photos/sitepreview.jpg[/img]

item.title: Need everyones opinion! - pleas read & post
